categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Skirmish on Holageus was a battle of the Galactic Civil War on the planet Holageus.

Holageus was the site of a vicious battle between the New Republic forces and the Imperial Remnant. The two Ewok brothers Tokkat and Wunka fought for the New Republic during this battle but Wunka was killed.

Following the battle, Tokkat took the body of his brother back to Endor for burial. Rather than returning to combat, he then retired on the Forest Moon. As an honored hunter of Bright Tree Village, he served as its unofficial ambassador to the New Republic.
